originalText.text:
Asit  went above, and beyond!
He is  an amazing realtor.
From our initial consult through the closing,   he was very professional, informative and always available to discuss our concerns. He made  sure the apartment was professionally cleaned, and hired a painter to touch up windowsills and any scuff marks, etc. and did an amazing 3-D Virtual tour of the apartment.
And,  he got our buyers  on the first weekend’s open house!
I highly recommend him.

originalText.text:
Asit Parikh was Amazing! The best broker to sell your property in NYC, especially downtown. He is a passionate and knowledgeable West Village local, who also appreciated the uniqueness of West Village Houses, where he sold my Bank Street co-op apartment above ask.

Asit’s expert advice and patience helped guide my decision whether to sell or sublet my home of 32 years. Once I decided to sell he was a life saver prioritizing a to-do-list to prepare my 2 bedroom walk-up for sale within budget through Compass’s Concierge Service. Asit held my hand throughout the entire process including decluttering, obtaining a storage unit, selecting paint colors, and light staging while closely monitoring the progress.

I listed my apartment during a very challenging time when interest rates began increasing every month. Always enthusiastic, informed, and an industrious problem solver Asit was able to quickly react to the shifting housing market. He made creative adjustments, tweaked copy, and updated photos so my listing continued to stand out on the MLS, plus posted cool videos with my cat on Instagram.

Asit was extremely professional and scheduled open houses and showings with quality buyers multiple times a week. He updated me after each appointment and paid close attention to every detail as he followed up and communicated with potential buyers and their realtors.

Asit was also instrumental in facilitating the board approval package. His knowledge of the HDFC conversion of West Village Houses was invaluable. Lastly, he found me a great lawyer for a seamless closing. Asit has now become a friend!

originalText.text: Asit has been a delight to work with right from the start.  He listened, acted, and carrried things through.  When we ran into some glitches toward the end of the sale, he was creative in working through the issues and never let us down.

originalText.text:
Asit was the broker on the transaction to sell my 167 Perry Street, Apt 4H apartment:
-  he found a buyer relatively quickly
-  Asit worked tirelessly to move the process forward despite the roadblocks/hurtles placed by the 167 Perry Street Board and the managing agent
-  He worked with us to assist in making sure the apartment was in tip-top shape by having it cleaned, inventoried, etc.

All-in-all, a very strong effort to assist us in getting this apartment sold.  Would definitely work with Asit again!!

originalText.text: I have known Asit since 2006 and in 2016 we started looking, on and off, at properties for my purchase. He proved very patient with my very specific/narrow tastes and unhurried pacing. He combines an encyclopedic understanding of New York City's neighborhoods and resourcefulness in identifying appropriate listings with serious design and construction intel and savvy in navigating the purchase process. While several deals we pursued ultimately fell apart because of unscrupulous sellers, he remained steadfast. In December 2022 we finally found my "White Whale", and I closed in March 2023. It's been a journey, but he got me exactly where I needed to be. Thank you, Asit!
